Strike Me Instead.name: Strike Me Instead
Strike Me Instead.flavor: You call upon your innate sense of justice and honor, whisper a short prayer, and redirect an attack so that you take the hit for those you would protect.
Strike Me Instead.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is attacked
Strike Me Instead.effect: The attack misses all of your allies it targets, but automatically hits you even if you werenâ€™t a target of the attack.

Just Radiance.name: Just Radiance
Just Radiance.flavor: A burst of light, like purity and justice, explodes from your holy symbol, sending searing pain through enemies you have challenged.
Just Radiance.target: Each enemy marked by you in the burst
Just Radiance.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target cannot make an attack that does not include you.

Challenge the Unjust.name: Challenge the Unjust
Challenge the Unjust.flavor: Your enemies surround you, and the purity within you cries out for justice. You focus a powerful prayer through your holy symbol, sending forth a radiant burst of punishing force that no enemy can ignore.
Challenge the Unjust.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Challenge the Unjust.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
